Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientView
public class CLI extends Object implements ClientView
CLI class for Command Line Interface game UI

  • Method Details

    • setupPhase

      public void setupPhase()
      Setup phase handler, prints all necessary info and available commands for the setup of the game

    • setClientController

      Specified by:
      setClientController in interface ClientView
      Parameters:
      clientController - controller for the CLI

    • waitGameStartPhase

      public void waitGameStartPhase()
      Wait end of setup phase handler, makes the player wait the rest of the players

    • planningPhase

      public void planningPhase()
      Planning phase handler, prints all necessary info and available commands for the setup of the game. Handles assistant use and main game info

    • actionPhase

      public void actionPhase()
      Action phase handler, prints all necessary info and available commands for the setup of the game. Handles character use, student movement, cloud selection, mother nature movement and main game info

    • endingPhase

      public void endingPhase()
      Ending phase handler, notifies the player that the game ended and shows the winner

    • parseAction

      public void parseAction(String action)
      Parses the input string and interprets it as an action. If the action is badly typed or not available, prompts the user to enter another one.
      Parameters:
      action - string of the action input

    • generateCharacterRequest

      public PlayCharacterRequest generateCharacterRequest(Integer characterNumber)
      Builder method to create a correct and functional request for a character effect. Handles character types and automatically asks only strictly necessary parameters for the character usage.
      Parameters:
      characterNumber - number of the character to play
      Returns:
      PlayCharacterRequest to send to the controller, to play the character

    • printLongRow

      public void printLongRow()
      Utility method to print a long line

      public void printShortRow()
      Utility method to print a short line

    • clearConsole

      public void clearConsole()
      Utility method to clear the CLI

    • parseColor

      public Color parseColor(String color)
      Parameters:
      color - color to parse
      Returns:
      Color equivalent to input string, null if not found
